description.value: When wielding two melee weapons, can attack with both as Full Action, make one WS Test, on success, target's Ap counts as normal, but toughness only counts once against the combined damage roll. A successful Dodge/Parry avoids attack.

system.benefit: When wielding two melee weapons, can attack with both as Full Action, make one WS Test, on success, target's Ap counts as normal, but toughness only counts once against the combined damage roll. A successful Dodge/Parry avoids attack.

specialAbilities.name: Dual Strike
specialAbilities.description: Full Action: Attack with both melee weapons using one WS test. Combined damage ignores TB once. Dodge/Parry avoids entire attack.
